title: Album Page, "Detail of Tower, Gernsbach, Germany", August 10, 1887
medium: Graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, at center: Gernsbach / Aug 10th 1887; at upper right corner: 3 / (inscribed in circle) 3.
description: Vertical sheet illustrating a building with a tall, slender tower and small clock in a projecting gable of the structure's main façade.  There is a deep eave projecting over a double-glazed casement window with shutters opened wide.  Above this window and below the clock face is another, smaller window opening at the attic level.  Behind this rises the tower with louvered openings visible on two sides, and is surmounted by a faceted cupola with a ball and spike finial.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Detail of Tower, Gernsbach, Germany", August 10, 1887.
August 10, 1887. Graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-88.
